name: First Assault
description: Capture 100 squares of land from other nations

name: Expansion
description: Reach a total area of 500 squares

name: Enemy of my Enemy
description: Form an alliance with another nation

name: Strength in Numbers
description: Have two members of your nation online at one time

name: Resource Rich
description: Hold 5 different resource locations at one time

name: Surround and Gain Ground
description: Capture 3 enemy defenses that have first been disabled by being flanked

name: Scholar
description: Discover one of the ancient Great Libraries thought to be hidden in these lands

name: Joule Thief
description: Capture 3 energy supply lines from enemy territory

name: Prisoners of War
description: Capture 5 manpower supply lines from enemy territory

name: Cannon Fodder
description: Our Cannons fire on attacking enemies 50 times

name: Gray Goo
description: Our Nanobot Swarm Bases launch an attack on invading enemies 10 times

name: Biohazard
description: Our Supervirus Contagion defense is launched against an invading enemy

name: Bolts from the Blue
description: Our Keraunocon defense electrifies invading enemies 5 times

name: Mesmerizing
description: Our Hypnotic Inducer defense lulls our invading enemies into surrendering 25 times

name: Eldritch Priest
description: Our Temple of Zoth-Ommog defense summons the unutterable upon our enemies 3 times

name: Magic Carpet Ride
description: Our Djinn Portal defense wards off invading enemies 100 times

name: Energy Heist
description: Steal 10,000 energy from other nations by capturing their energy storage or supply lines

name: Hostile Takeover
description: Steal 1000 manpower from other nations by capturing their manpower storage or supply lines

name: Counter Offensive
description: Capture 2500 squares of land from invading nations through counter-attack by defenses

name: Lebensraum
description: Capture 10,000 squares of land from other nations

name: Major Donor
description: Donate a total of 100,000 energy to allies

name: World Class
description: Earn a total of 10,000 credits from captured orbs

name: Resource Magnate
description: Hold 15 different resource locations at one time

name: Earning Empire
description: Hold 4 different orb locations at one time

name: Despoiler
description: Capture 250 different resources from enemy nations

name: Grave Digger
description: Capture 4 different Grave of an Ancient God locations

name: Enter the Void
description: Capture 4 different Orbs of the Void

name: Reinforcements
description: Donate a total of 100,000 manpower to allies
